mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_IDX, PRODUCT_TYPE,PRODUCT_PROPERTY, PRODUCT_NAME,PRODUCT_PRICE,PRODUCT_TEXT,PRODUCT_IMAGE,PRODUCT_DETAIL FROM PRODUCT_BOX WHERE PRODUCT_TYPE = #{productType} and PRODUCT_PROPERTY = #{productProperty} ORDER BY PRODUCT_IDX
